sentences.en: An ominous air emits from the chalice, gripping the hearts of those who peer at it as if determined to drag them to the world of the dead.
sentences.cn: 一股不祥的气息从这个圣杯中散发出来，抓住那些窥视它的人们的心，仿佛下定决心要将他们拽入死者的世界一般。

sentences.en: As Thomas Reed stalked the lost chalice in Biomorph Land, he often needed to back up.
sentences.cn: 在托马斯?里德潜心追踪生物形态王国里失踪的圣杯时, 他经常需要备份.

sentences.en: He does not regard his new job as a poisoned chalice.
sentences.cn: 他并不认为自己的新工作是金杯毒酒。

sentences.en: He had already heard that various rumors were in circulation about Miss Chalice.
sentences.cn: 他听说过,关于查理丝小姐这个人,流传着各种各样的流言蜚语.

sentences.en: He inherited a poisoned chalice when he took over the job as union leader.
sentences.cn: 他接手工会领导职务,看似风光,实则会给他带来很多麻烦.

sentences.en: Miss Chalice beamed with pleasure when he rose.
sentences.cn: 当他站起身时,查理丝小姐高兴地抿嘴一笑.

sentences.en: Our destiny offers not the cup of despair but chalice of opportunty!
sentences.cn: 命运给我们的不是失望之酒,而是生命之杯.

sentences.en: Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but chalice of opportunity.
sentences.cn: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒, 而是机会之杯.——尼克森.

sentences.en: Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but chalice of opportunity. - --- Richard Nixon.
sentences.cn: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒, 而是机会之杯. ---- 尼克松.

sentences.en: Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but the chalice of opportunity. ( Richard Nixon )
sentences.cn: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒, 而是机会之杯 ( 尼克松 )

sentences.en: Some believe the grial is in the Chalice Well in Glastonbury - put there by Joseph of Arimathea.
sentences.cn: 一些人认为圣杯是卡斯顿伯利的圣餐杯 —— 被阿里玛特的约瑟夫放在那里.

sentences.en: Some churches have also begun to allow "intinction" or dipping bread in communion wine rather than sharing the chalice, while others have stopped offering wine altogether, the newspaper said.
sentences.cn: 报纸上说，有的教堂已经开始允许用面包蘸圣餐酒，不再共用圣餐杯，而其他一些教堂则完全停止供应集体圣餐酒了。

sentences.en: Some people even claimed that he appointed his political rival only in the belief that he was giving him a poisoned chalice and that he would not last more than a year.
sentences.cn: 有人甚至说，他之所以任命自己的政治对手，是因为他知道所给的职位是杯诱人的毒酒，接受者肯定撑不过一年。

sentences.en: The blade and chalice guarding o'er her gates.
sentences.cn: 剑刃和圣餐杯守护在她的门外。

sentences.en: The chalice or the wine used in the celebration of the Eucharist.
sentences.cn: 用于圣餐庆典中的酒杯或酒.

sentences.en: The destiny offers not the cup of despair, but the chalice of opportunity.
sentences.cn: 命运给于我们的不是失望之酒, 而是机会之杯.

sentences.en: The leadership of North Korea could be a poisoned chalice.
sentences.cn: 朝鲜领导层有点像一只被下毒的圣杯.

sentences.en: The Pope then brought out a communion wafer and a chalice of wine.
sentences.cn: 教皇出示领圣体用的饼,还有一杯圣酒.

trans.tran_cn: 高脚酒杯，圣餐杯，金杯毒酒，看似诱人实则令人讨厌的事物
trans.tran_en: a gold or silver decorated cup used, for example, to hold wine in Christian religious services
